content: a stash-busting filet crochet mesh grocery bag that folds down to fit into a pocket on the bag s side yarn is held double throughout **materials ** size 3 or size 5 thread sample used the following mc coats & clark south maid 100% mercerized cotton 400 yds per ball white 2 balls required cc1 coats & clark royale classic crochet cotton 100% mercerized cotton 350 yards per ball 401-orchid pink 2 balls required cc2 small amount of size 10 mercerized cotton in brown about 30-40 yards
